description:
Honed back to the essentials, the Ghost Axe is one of the lightest ever made by Grivel. The steel head and pick offer no-compromise strength and durability, and the slightly curved shaft allows you plunge or self arrest when travelling over snow.

  • Hot forged carbon steel head and pick for strength and durability
  • G-Bone shaft has an ergonomic shape with side grooves to create higher resistance with lower thickness
name: Grivel Ghost Ice Axe
